about_the_game:
MEET THE FAIRY


Accompanying warriors on battlefields during the times of war, Asaradian Fairies don't have much to do in times of peace. Because of that, she will gladly help you on your way of becoming a Hero, by aiding you with some of her powers!

Take note that this DLC has little impact on the gameplay and is more a way to support indie studio so we can keep creating :)

Purchasing Warlock Fairy will unlock:


  • Warlock Fairy skin
  • 50% more gold dropping from enemies
  • Additional skill point to use in the skill tree
